longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival. 

Visa required, except for Nationals of Russian Fed.
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to  P. vivax
  exists from June to October inclusive, particularly in
  southern areas (Khatlon Region), and in some central
  (Dushanbe), western (Gorno-Badakhstan), and northern
  (Leninabad Region) areas. Recommended prevention in risk
  areas: C.
shortInfo: 3 дня. Далее необходимо регистрироваться. Возможен въезд по внутреннему паспорту.
